workExperience.description: Worked on maintaining and developing new features for various client projects. Primarily served as a developer for a U.S.-based SaaS company whose product is a platform used by hundreds of universities across the United States. This platform enables instructors to create problems, exercises, and interactive books for students.

Participated in the development of the company’s main product, a billing and accounting system used in Honduras, El Salvador, and Colombia. Worked on both backend and frontend, optimizing code, scaling the system to new markets, and adding new features in a challenging fintech environment.
Developed frontend applications and managed existing web platforms at a digital agency. Also worked on backend development for some projects, ensuring application functionality and performance.

education.degree: Master’s in Web Technologies, Cloud Computing, and Mobile Applications
education.description: Master’s program specializing in Web Development, Kubernetes Deployments, Project Management, and Mobile Applications. Final project: 'Development of an Interactive Platform for Urban Incident Reporting and Management.'

Training focused on desktop and web application development. Participated in multiple hackathons and programming competitions. Thesis project: Development of an application for buying and selling spare parts.

keyProjects.title: E-commerce Platform
keyProjects.description: A complete e-commerce solution with payment processing, inventory management, and analytics dashboard.

keyProjects.title: Financial Dashboard
keyProjects.description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing financial data with customizable charts and automated reports.
